ing: 1 cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
des: "This one is a quick recipe that merely involves mixing a few basic ingredients and patting the dough into the pan. No need to wait for the dough to rise with this approach."
ins:
Combine flour, salt, sugar, and yeast in a large bowl.  Mix in oil and warm water.  Spread out on a large pizza pan.  Top as desired.
Bake at 375 degrees C (190 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes.
